name: Perium
description:
1. I did all the level design and functionality of the levels in this project. Our team name was "Almost Awesome". The game was meant to be played with a controller. Any dual shock controller will work. I added keyboard support just for the in browser build.  It was everyone's favorite among all the other teams. I was inspired by making a cross between Mario and Darksouls. Play it in full screen mode. Enjoy the game.
  2. The game does work with controllers in browser, including up to 4 players. So go grab your buddy and play!
  3. Please Post screenshots making it to the end of the levels! its super exciting. through thorough play testing it has been proven all 3 levels can be beat. 
  4. let me know your thoughts in the comments below
